# AI Agent Documentation Index

Quick navigation for AI agents. **Start with QUICK_START.md**.

## Quick Start

- **[QUICK_START.md](./QUICK_START.md)** — Essential pattern, quick commands, critical rules (recommended first)
- **[QUICK_REFERENCE.md](./QUICK_REFERENCE.md)** — Type aliases, machine state helpers, function templates

## Reference

- **[README.md](./README.md)** — Full agent instructions, testing guidelines, common tasks
- **[TROUBLESHOOTING.md](./TROUBLESHOOTING.md)** — Common issues, debugging tips

## Topic Docs

| Topic | Location |
|-------|----------|
| Machine types | `docs/MACHINE_TYPES.md` |
| XRDP issues | `docs/XRDP.md` |
| Logging | `lib/logging_utils.py` |
| Storage/sync | `sync/` module |

## Project Overview

Automates Linux server/workstation setup via SSH with security hardening, desktop environments, application deployment, and data management (Samba, rsync, par2).
